decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD FOR LBC: The works hereby permitted shall be begun not later than three years from the date of this consent.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1)(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
description: Renovations to existing public house interior to modify the layout, including removal and addition of doors, removal of walls, enlarging existing internal window into a door, reinstatement of the kitchen, installation of a bathroom, and the construction of new walls. Works will also be done to repair floors and ceilings damaged by water leakage, and the general updating of decorations including carpet and tiles and the replastering and repainting of walls and ceilings.
